cards.markdown:
Time for a Thursday tune:

<object height="344" width="425"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/dYP-wBaqQAI&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed allowfullscreen="true" height="344" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/dYP-wBaqQAI&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425"></embed></object>

And, in fact, it’s not just a Thursday tune, it’s a Thursday Tuttle tune, as it was [written on one of the Friday morning meetings of the Social Media Cafe](http://tuttleclub.wordpress.com/2008/09/20/that-twitter-song/) in London.
